com.ffbit.maven.solr.jetty

Interface JettyConfiguration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSolrConfigurationMojo, AbstractSolrMojo, RunSolrMojo, StartSolrMojo

    public interface JettyConfiguration
    Represents configuration for running Jetty Server.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getContextPath()
      Get context path.
      String getJettyXml()
      Get comma separated list of a jetty xml configuration files whose contents will be applied before any plugin configuration.
      int getPort()
      Get running port.
      long getServerWaitingTimeout()
      Get server waiting timeout in milliseconds for plugin's own unit test use.

    • Method Detail

      • getPort

        int getPort()
        Get running port.
        Returns:
        running port.

      • getContextPath

        Get context path.
        Returns:
        context path.

      • getJettyXml

        String getJettyXml()
        Get comma separated list of a jetty xml configuration files whose contents will be applied before any plugin configuration.
        Returns:
        comma separated list of a jetty xml configuration files.

      • getServerWaitingTimeout

        long getServerWaitingTimeout()
        Get server waiting timeout in milliseconds for plugin's own unit test use.
        Returns:
        • 0 for "production" use
        • a small positive for unit test use
